title: Help educate and tutor me on how to utilize AI for my job
content: I am looking to educate myself on AI and explore ways to utilize it for my work. I don't have any preconceived ideas other than I want to learn how to use AI in general for daily life and explore if I can utilize it for my work to help create compelling slides, or to analyze data or to take an article, perhaps video presentation and summarize important points.
skills: AI Content Creation,     Data Augmentation,     Writing
